snippet: Gov. John W. Hickenlooper’s narrow victory over Bob Beauprez defied a wave of Republican victories in races for governor in usual Democratic strongholds like Maryland, Massachusetts and Illinois.
abstract: Colorado Gov John W Hickenlooper's narrow victory over Republican challenger Bob Beauprez offers warning to Democrats about precariousness of power in swing state; Hickenlooper's win defied waved of Republican victories in races for governor in usual Democratic strongholds like Maryland, Massachusetts and Illinois.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John W. Hickenlooper’s narrow victory over Bob Beauprez defied a wave of Republican victories in races for governor in usual Democratic strongholds like Maryland, Massachusetts and Illinois.

headline.main: As Other Democrats Fall, Colorado Governor Goes From Angst to Relief
headline.print_headline: As Other Democrats Fall, Colorado Governor Goes From Angst to Relief
